snippet: The person was shot after resisting arrest, the government of Helong, a city in China’s northeast, said on its microblog.
abstract: Chinese troops shoot and kill someone suspected of illegally crossing border from North Korea; incident occurs in Helong, area prone to unlawful border crossings by North Korean defectors or soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The person was shot after resisting arrest, the government of Helong, a city in China’s northeast, said on its microblog.

headline.main: China: Fatal Shooting at Korean Border
headline.print_headline: Asia; China: Fatal Shooting at Korean Border
